Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local Player; local Torso; local Character; local Humanoid;
local ANIM_Equip; local ANIM_Throw; local SOUND_Throw = Handle:WaitForChild('SOUND_Throw')
local RELOAD_TIME = 7 local RANGE = 200
local LastThrown = Tool:WaitForChild('LastThrown')
local PoleScript = Tool:WaitForChild('PoleScript')
local function tm() return Workspace.DistributedGameTime end
local function Slerp(t, a, b) local om = math.acos(math.min(1, a.unit:Dot(b.unit))) if om < 0.01 then return (1-t)*a + t *b else return (math.sin((1-t)*om)/math.sin(om))*a + (math.sin( t *om)/math.sin(om))*b end end
local function FindCharacterAncestor(subject) if subject and subject ~= Workspace then local humanoid = subject:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid then return subject, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(subject.Parent) end end return nil end
Tool.Equipped:connect(function(mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild('Humanoid') Torso = Character:WaitForChild('Torso') -- ANIM_Equip = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:WaitForChild('ANIM_Equip')) ANIM_Throw = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:WaitForChild('ANIM_Throw')) -- ANIM_Equip:Play() -- if (tm()-LastThrown.Value) > RELOAD_TIME then Handle.Transparency = 0 mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png' else Handle.Transparency = 1 mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png' end -- mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if (tm()-LastThrown.Value) > RELOAD_TIME then local ignore = {} local mouseRay = Ray.new(mouse.UnitRay.Origin, mouse.UnitRay.Direction*999) local hit, at = Workspace:FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(mouseRay, ignore) while hit and (FindCharacterAncestor(hit) or not hit.CanCollide or hit.Transparency == 1) do table.insert(ignore, hit) hit, at = Workspace:FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(mouseRay, ignore) end if (at-Torso.Position).magnitude > RANGE then return end -- LastThrown.Value = tm() -- ANIM_Throw:Play(0) Delay(0.1, function() SOUND_Throw:Play() end) -- repeat until ANIM_Throw.KeyframeReached:wait() == 'Thrown' -- local spear = Handle:Clone() local sc = PoleScript:Clone() sc.Parent = spear sc.Disabled = false -- local desiredTarget = at local vectorTo = desiredTarget - Torso.Position local torsoVector = vectorTo.magnitude * Torso.CFrame.lookVector -- local thetaBetween = math.acos(math.min(1, math.max(-1, vectorTo.unit:Dot(torsoVector.unit)))) -- if thetaBetween > math.pi/4 then local frac = (math.pi/4) / thetaBetween desiredTarget = Torso.Position + Slerp(frac, torsoVector, vectorTo) end -- sc:WaitForChild('BallDropScript'):WaitForChild('creator').Value = Player sc:WaitForChild('BallDropScript'):WaitForChild('Target').Value = desiredTarget local failValue = sc:WaitForChild('BallDropScript'):WaitForChild('Fail') failValue.Changed:connect(function() if failValue.Value then LastThrown.Value = 0 Handle.Transparency = 0 mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png' end end) -- spear.Velocity = Vector3.new() spear.CanCollide = false spear.RotVelocity = Vector3.new() -- local float = Instance.new('BodyForce', spear) float.force = Vector3.new(0,spear:GetMass(),0)*196.2 -- spear.Parent = game.Workspace -- Handle.Transparency = 1 mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png' -- wait(RELOAD_TIME - (tm()-LastThrown.Value)) -- if not failValue.Value then Handle.Transparency = 0 mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png' end end end) end)
Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() ANIM_Equip:Stop() ANIM_Throw:Stop() -- Handle.Transparency = 0 end)

print("Run RightgripScript, parent=", script.Parent)
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Tool = script.Parent.Parent
local armChildRemovedConn = nil local Motor6DGrip = nil local EquippedNum = 0
Tool.Equipped:connect(function() EquippedNum = EquippedNum + 1 local myEquip = EquippedNum --some vars local Player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) local Character = Player.Character
local rightarm = Character:FindFirstChild('Right Arm') if rightarm and rightarm:FindFirstChild('RightGrip') then local rightGrip = rightarm['RightGrip'] local handle = rightGrip.Part1
--kill my joint when the normal joint is removed --this must be done here so that the joint is removed --_right away_ after unequipping and the character doesn't --glitch up. local armChildRemovedConn = rightarm.ChildRemoved:connect(function(ch) if ch == rightGrip then Motor6DGrip:Remove() Motor6DGrip = nil -- if handle and Character:FindFirstChild('Torso') then if Tool.Parent.Parent:IsA('Player') then --the sword has been deselected --put the sword far away so the user doesn't notice that the handle doesn't --update for about 0.1 seconds after selecting the tool. handle.CFrame = CFrame.new(100000, 100000, 100000) else --if in the workspace, position the handle where it should be dropped --use the size of the handle to make sure it's dropped far enough away handle.CFrame = Character.Torso.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 0, -(handle.Size.magnitude+2)) end end end end)
--make my new joint Motor6DGrip = Create'Motor6D'{ Name = 'RightGrip_Motor'; Part0 = rightarm; Part1 = handle; C0 = CFrame.new(0,-1,0); C1 = CFrame.new(0,1,0)*CFrame.Angles(3.6,0,0); }
--kill the old weld rightGrip.Part1 = nil rightGrip.Part0 = nil Motor6DGrip.Parent = rightGrip.Parent end end)
Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() EquippedNum = EquippedNum + 1 if armChildRemovedConn then armChildRemovedConn:disconnect() armChildRemovedConn = nil end end)

local Spear = script.Parent
local BallDropScript = script:WaitForChild('BallDropScript')
local Creator = BallDropScript:WaitForChild('creator') local Player = Creator.Value local DesiredTarget = BallDropScript:WaitForChild('Target') local Character = Player.Character local Fail = BallDropScript:WaitForChild('Fail')
Delay(10, function() Spear:Destroy() end)
Delay(0.5, function() Spear.CanCollide = true end)
local function FindCharacterAncestor(subject) if subject and subject ~= Workspace then local humanoid = subject:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid then return subject, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(subject.Parent) end end return nil end
local function onTouched(part) if not FindCharacterAncestor(part) then -- see if we have an empty space to do the effect in local at = (Spear.CFrame*CFrame.new(0,3.5,0)).p BallDropScript:WaitForChild('Target').Value = at local region = Region3.new(at + Vector3.new(-1,5,-1), at + Vector3.new(1,1,1)) local parts = Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(region) for _, part in pairs(parts) do if not FindCharacterAncestor(part) and part.CanCollide then Fail.Value = true Spear.Parent = nil return end end -- Create effect BallDropScript.Parent = nil BallDropScript.Disabled = false BallDropScript.Parent = game.Workspace Spear:Destroy() return true end end Spear.Touched:connect(onTouched) local function Slerp(t, a, b) local om = math.acos(math.min(1, a.unit:Dot(b.unit))) if om < 0.01 then return (1-t)*a + t *b else return (math.sin((1-t)*om)/math.sin(om))*a + (math.sin( t *om)/math.sin(om))*b end end local function topVector(cf) local _,_,_,_,r5,_,_,r8,_,_,r11,_ = cf:components() return Vector3.new(r5,r8,r11) end function CFrameFromTopBack(at, top, back) local right = top:Cross(back) return CFrame.new(at.x, at.y, at.z, right.x, top.x, back.x, right.y, top.y, back.y, right.z, top.z, back.z) end local frac = 0 local start = Spear.Position local target = DesiredTarget.Value local initialDir = (CFrame.new(start, target)*CFrame.Angles(0.5, 0, 0)).lookVector local finalDir = (CFrame.new(start, target)*CFrame.Angles(-0.5, 0, 0)).lookVector local distance = (start-target).magnitude local mid = (start + initialDir*distance/2) local startT = tick() local velo = 80 local duration = distance / velo -- local ignore = {Spear} while true do wait() local elapsed = tick()-startT local frac = elapsed / duration if frac > 1 then break end local lastAt = (Spear.CFrame*CFrame.new(0,3.5,0)).p local at = start:Lerp(mid,frac):Lerp(mid:Lerp(target,frac),frac) local dir = Slerp(frac,initialDir,finalDir) Spear.CFrame = CFrame.new(at, at+dir)*CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2,0,0) local newAt = (Spear.CFrame*CFrame.new(0,3.5,0)).p local ray = Ray.new(lastAt, (newAt-lastAt)) local hit, loc = Workspace:FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(ray, ignore) while hit do if onTouched(hit) then return end table.insert(ignore, hit) hit, loc = Workspace:FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(ray, ignore) end end
Spear:Destroy()
